title: Those Injected With A Deadly Covid "Vaccine" Considered Unvaccinated For The First 14 Days
cleaned_text:
Deaths from vaccines are common close to the date of vaccination. For years the deaths reported after childhood vaccinations falsely being called SIDS show that 75% of the deaths occurred within the first week.

Learning from this, to skew and hide the damage from Covid vaccines a blatant lie was created. Stating that people who received a deadly jab were considered un-vaccinated for the first 14 days. We have reported on this many times before.

This is obviously fraud, created to assist in hiding the vaccine genocide.

One of many ways they are manipulating the statistics to hide their crimes.

None of the numbers from the government and health officials regarding death rates should be trusted. There should be a simple report, death rates showing who received an injection regardless of when.
